# AVAudio3DMixingPointSourceInHeadMode.mono

**Case**

The point source remains a single mono source inside the head of the listener regardless of the channels it consists of.

## Declaration

```swift
case mono
```

## In-Head Modes

- **AVAudio3DMixingPointSourceInHeadMode.bypass**: The point source distributes into each output channel inside the head of the listener.
